{
    os << "Pastry IRoutingTable row {" << endl;
    for (PRTRow::const_iterator i = row.begin(); i != row.end(); i++) {
        os << "        " << i->node << " ; Ping: ";
        if (i->rtt != SimTime::getMaxTime())
            os << i->rtt << endl;
        else os << "<unknown>" << endl;
    }
    os << "    }";
    return os;
}
